body_html: Nice tool! However presenting only the output of CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING can be very misleading, as it will show some ops as very costly, even though they are the ones that allow to hide latency much later. I think we should at least mention this in the output, or produce two lists (one more without CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING).

body: Nice tool! However presenting only the output of `CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING` can be very misleading, as it will show some ops as very costly, even though they are the ones that allow to hide latency much later. I think we should at least mention this in the output, or produce two lists (one more without CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING).
